name: basscss-base-typography
readme:
# Basscss Base Typography Base typography styles module for Basscss http://basscss.com ## Base type scale Typographic elements are normalized to a simple type scale that works well across devices. Default top and bottom margins are set for commonly-used typographic elements. ```html

Hamburger 1

Hamburger 2

Hamburger 3

Hamburger 4

Hamburger 5
Hamburger 6
``` ## Type scale utilities The `.h1` – `.h6` font-size utilities can be used to override an element’s default size. ```html

Pastrami 1

Pastrami 2

Pastrami 3

Pastrami 4

Pastrami 5

Pastrami 6

``` ## Lists By default, lists have bullets or numbers and padding left. ```html
  • Half-Smoke
  • Kielbasa
  • Bologna
  1. Prosciutto
  2. Andouille
  3. Bratwurst
  4. Chorizo
``` To remove default list styling, use `.list-reset`. ```html
  • List Reset
  • Removes bullets
  • Removes numbers
  • Removes padding
``` To set lists inline, use utilities. ```html
  • Half-Smoke
  • Kielbasa
  • Bologna
  • Prosciutto
```
